job_description:
• Define detailed requirements and co-develop joint partner demos and proofs of concept.
• Collaborate with partners to create statements of work (SOW) for implementation as needed.
• Degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical discipline.
• Deep technical experience in the server industry with strong knowledge of multi-core processors.
• Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills with both technical and non-technical audiences.
• Enable validation and performance optimization of AMD server CPUs with partner products.
• Track progress and ensure alignment and readiness with AMD’s product launch plans.
• Drive closure of open technical issues by leveraging AMD and partner subject matter experts.
